name: Gunslinger`s Jacket
description: Deadly with a gun, suffices to say even deadlier with two. This is a ranged dual-wielding passive bonus. Also enables the ability to dual wield ranged weapons.

name: Malduin`s Cloth
description: Retaliates with a blast of poisonous fumes, poisoning all nearby enemies.

name: Miasma Robes
description: Releases a cloud of toxic gases which choke and confuse your enemies.

name: Astral Robes
description: "Often worn by spirit guides, the robes were a sign of gifted diviners, though given the fickle nature of fate`s strands, they could just as easily be mistaken for charlatans."

skill_params.state_name: Vitality Damage converted to Aether Damage

name: Fanatic`s Overcoat
description: Enter a state of fanatical frenzy, tearing at your enemies with ruthless resolve.

name: Skinflayer Raiment
description: "It is unknown as to how many victims it took to sew together these foul robes."

name: Zolhan`s Battle Plate
description: "Armor commissioned by the famed battle master, Zolhan."

name: Cloth of Unspeakable Invocation
description: "Chthonian robes worn only by elite members of the bloodthirsty cult."

name: Darkflame Chestguard
description: Partially enter the spirit realm, warding yourself against life-sapping spells and physical assault.

skill_params.state_name: Fire Damage converted to Vitality Damage

name: High Consillar`s Coat
description: "Evidently crafted for an Erulan nobleman, the cloth feels very soft, and yet resilient."

name: Eastern Robes
description: Brings down the sky upon your enemies.

name: Empowered Malduin`s Cloth
description: Retaliates with a blast of poisonous fumes, poisoning all nearby enemies.

name: Sharpshooter`s Coat
description: Expertise in the use of rifles and scopes. This is a ranged two-handed weapon passive bonus.

name: Baldir`s Armor
description: Spill the blood of the heathens that dare stand in your way.

name: Corruptor`s Robe
description: The armor corrupts your soul, granting you dark power and greater control over your minions.

name: Empowered Gunslinger`s Jacket
description: Deadly with a gun, suffices to say even deadlier with two. This is a ranged dual-wielding passive bonus. Also enables the ability to dual wield ranged weapons.

name: Empowered Miasma Robes
description: Releases a cloud of toxic gases which choke and confuse your enemies.

name: Silver Sentinel`s Armor
description: Your target becomes marked with a blessed Luminari rune that seals their fate. This symbol is particularly effective against fiends of the void.

name: Callidor`s Vestments
description: Unleash a massive explosion of arcane energies.

name: Dawnguard Plate
description: A spike of electric energy erupts towards your assailant.

name: Flame Keeper`s Jacket
description: Fires an exploding round that shatters on impact in a large burst of flame. Activates off of default weapon attacks.

name: Myrmidon Chestguard
description: Strike your foe with your shield, inflicting grievous internal harm. Requires a melee weapon.

name: Stealth Jacket of the Blind Assassin
description: The Eye of Thaddeus exposes easy to exploit weak points on your feeble foes.
set_parts: Unseeing Eye of the Blind Assassin

name: Surcoat of Mogdrogen
description: Fills you and your nearby allies with Mogdrogen`s tranquility, emboldening them and their beastly companions. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

description: Enter a state of fanatical frenzy, tearing at your enemies with ruthless resolve.

description: "It is unknown as to how many victims it took to sew together these foul robes."

name: Vestment of Mourning
description: "Priest`s robes once worn by members of the Weeping Eye cabal."

name: Daega`s Raiment
description: Daega`s oath to Dreeg compels you.

description: "Often worn by spirit guides, the robes were a sign of gifted diviners, though given the fickle nature of fate`s strands, they could just as easily be mistaken for charlatans."

description: "A crowning achievement in Gazer wear."

description: "A crowning achievement in Gazer wear."

name: Devil`s Cage Hauberk
description: Trap your foes in a prison of pure obsidian.

name: Fiendscale Jacket
description: Enemies who strike you become diseased with a deadly contagion that continues to spread beyond the host.

name: Rune Armor of Ignaffar
description: "Though the original bearer of this armor perished in a devastating blaze invoked by a rogue arcanist, the armor miraculously emerged from the inferno unscathed."

name: Venomancer`s Raiment
description: Empower your weapons and those of nearby allies with a dreadful venom. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

skill_params.state_name: Elemental Damage converted to Acid Damage

name: Shroud of Illusion
description: "The strange cloth shimmers and fades with the light, creating a mesmerizing illusion around the wearer."

skill_params.state_name: Aether Damage converted to Elemental Damage

name: Dread Armor of Azragor
description: "Azragor was a brutal man feared amongst his fellow knights for his underhanded, yet undisputable tactics."

name: Vestments of Severed Faith
description: "Disillusioned by the broken promises of the Menhirian Priesthood, Thalia had found a different voice that answered her prayers."

skill_params.state_name: Acid Damage converted to Chaos Damage

name: Vestments of the Great Guardian
description: "Robes of the high priest of Dreeg, charged with safeguarding the witch god`s earthly concerns."

name: Beastcaller`s Shroud
description: Whenever they see you harmed, your minions are thrown into a vengeful rage.

name: Chestguard of Justice
description: Become a beacon against the darkness as you erupt in righteous fire.

name: Clairvoyant`s Robe
description: Clear your mind in preparation for devastating spellwork.

skill_params.state_name: Chaos Damage converted to Aether Damage

name: Bloodrager`s Coat
description: Landing a crippling blow throws you into a rage as you thirst for more blood to spill.

name: Deathmarked Jacket
description: Mark your target for a swift and painful end.

name: Demonslayer`s Jacket
description: Steel yourself with every kill, for you never know when the fiends of the void may strike.

skill_params.state_name: Piercing Damage converted to Vitality Damage

name: Divinesteel Hauberk
description: "Armor bestowed upon masters of the Templar order who have gone beyond their mortal duties to become Exemplars."

name: Fiendmaster Raiment
description: Enact your will upon all your minions, and those of your allies. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

name: Frostdread Cuirass
description: Unleash the chill that dwells within your frozen heart, infusing your weapons with life-sapping chill. This effect is extended to nearby allies. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

name: Heart of Yugol
description: "Darkness made manifest, the vile heart beats in tune with the celestial tapestry."

skill_params.state_name: Aether Damage converted to Vitality Damage

name: Infernal Knight`s Jacket
description: Infernal flames burst out from the earth beneath your foes.

name: Iskandra`s Vestments
description: Adapted from Trozan`s legendary technique, Iskandra has put her own spin on this impressive arcane display.

skill_params.state_name: Aether Damage converted to Elemental Damage

name: Korvoran`s Chestguard
description: "Korvoran was a legendary nightblade renowned for his deadly accuracy with throwing knives, which he was able to procure even when his belt was seemingly devoid of blades."

name: Light`s Defender Plate
description: Conjure a storm-infused crystal at the target location to shock nearby enemies. Storm Shards scale with player damage bonuses.

name: Markovian`s Platemail
description: Markovian was ever aware of his surroundings, never caught by surprise and ever ready for conflict.

name: Necrolord`s Shroud
description: Imbue your weapons and those of nearby allies with the power of undeath. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

name: Stealth Jacket of the Venomblade
description: A vile poison that infuses the flesh and exposes hidden weaknesses.

skill_params.state_name: Piercing Damage converted to Acid Damage

name: Stormweave Armor
description: A touch of Ultos` wrath rips through the sky to shock your foes.

name: Trozan`s Vestments
description: Trozan`s powers continued to evolve beyond calling down shards of the sky, until the day he brought down the very heavens.

name: Ultos` Cuirass
description: Unleash the wrath of Ultos upon the battlefield in the form of a massive lightning storm.

name: Ulzuin`s Chestguard
description: A manifestation of the fire god`s rage, burning embers fall from the sky and incinerate all.

skill_params.state_name: Chaos Damage converted to Fire Damage

name: Valdun`s Jacket
description: Valdun was equally known for his skills with a rifle as with evading the authorities. He was never captured. This is a ranged two-handed weapon passive bonus.

name: Vestments of Agrivix
description: Conjure a wisp of arcane energy to assault your foes. Arcane Wisps scale with player damage bonuses.

name: Vestments of Dreeg
description: The secrets of Dreeg are revealed to you, threatening your sanity but also empowering your spellwork.

description: You were born for combat and thrive in the thick of it.

description: Lash out at your foes with Belgothian`s fury. When used as your default weapon attack, Belgothian`s Strikes increase the intensity of your attacks with every strike. Building up charges increases the potency of the bonuses.

name: Blood Knight`s Armor
description: Summon the tormented soul of Lord Nazaran to lash out at your foes and transfer the agony it inflicts as life essence for you. You can only summon one manifestation of Lord Nazaran at any one time. Lord Nazaran scales with player damage bonuses.

name: Bonemonger`s Chestguard
description: Unleash a wave of bones to impale your foes.
